page.title: 02LOCAL EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Our area does not employ a great many people. We have an army barracks called Glencorse. There are 500 soldiers there. They also have to employ cooking and cleaning staff and are therefore the largest employers in the area. The next largest is Rosslynlee Hospital which has 10 wards with 260 nursing staff, adding in cleaning and catering staff brings the total to 430. Next come the schools: Beeslack High School employs 65 people, Ladywood Primary 17, Glencorse Primary 11 and Mauricewood Primary 34. There are 7 large farms in the area employing a total of 35 people. Glencorse Golf Course has 1 full time person, 5 part time people and 1 kitchen lady. The sewage works employ 3 people. Most people travel to Edinburgh to work.
